value.title: Start Learning T-SQL for Azure Database and Azure Synapse
value.excerpt: Starting your journey to learn SQL? Adam gives you some resources to quickly ramp up with T-SQL for Azure SQL Database and Azure Synapse Analytics!  SQL Standard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SQL#Standardization_history/  Procedure Extensions - Different SQL bases out there https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SQL#Procedural_extensions

value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
value.excerpt: Want to learn Power BI from the masters?   Coming from Microsoft Excel and not sure where to start? Or, maybe you've used Power BI but want to make sure you are doing the right thing. Guy in a Cube has a course for you!  Power BI Blueprint: A step-by-step guide to creating report with Power BI.  https://guyinacu.be/courses

value.title: STOP refreshing a single table at a time! (Power BI Desktop)
value.excerpt: Stop refreshing one table at a time! Also, don't wait for the entire data model to finish refreshing. Refresh multiple tables within Power BI Desktop.  Gilbert Q's Blog: https://www.fourmoo.com/2020/04/22/how-to-refresh-selected-not-all-tables-in-power-bi-desktop/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Top 5 things to get started with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Getting started with Azure Synapse Analytics? Here are 5 things you should know as you begin your journey! Already been using Synapse SQL dedicated pools? Are you aware of these items?   Connect with Shane: https://www.linkedin.com/in/shanerisk/   Best Practices: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/best-practices-dedicated-sql-pool

value.title: Tracing your DAX queries in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how you can trace your DAX queries when trying to troubleshoot or optimize Power BI reports and datasets. There are a few options and Adam walks you through them.
